author: Satin
text: After 7 years, finally I left chennai. Having a lot of memories there. Specially in Triplicane (Bachelor's Paradise). Marina Beach & @Express_Avenue, two of my favourite place in Chennai.

author: Satin
text: After 2 back to back Mass movies ( RRR & KGF ) now it's time for a classy movie #Jersey . Original was too good. A perfect combination of Emotion + Love + Inspiration. All the best @shahidkapoor and Team. https://t.co/9CEVD6E6M2

author: Satin
text: After the box office failure of Tadap,  83 & Bachchan Pandey, Sajid Nadiadwala realised and back off from #KabhiEidKabhiDiwali . This is just the beginning. All Biggies from Bollywood will realised their mistakes soon.
